content.question: A projectile is launched with a speed of <math alttext="30 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> at an angle of <math alttext="60 degrees" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>60</mn><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> above the horizontal. The projectile lands on a ledge that is <math alttext="15 meters " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>15</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> above the launch point, as shown. The horizontal and vertical components <math alttext="v sub x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="v sub y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, respectively, of the velocity when the projectile lands are

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub x equals 15 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="v sub y equals negative 26 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>26</mn></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub x equals 15 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="v sub y equals negative 19.5 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>19.5</mn></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub x equals 26 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>26</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext=" v sub y equals negative 15 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub x equals 26 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>26</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="v sub y equals negative 22.8 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>22.8</mn></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub x equals 15 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="v sub y equals negative 24.6 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>24.6</mn></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
